tag_list: international, startups, funding, acceleration, global, worldwide, technology, us-market
overview:
Eyal is the Founder and Managing Partner of the Worldwide Investor Network (WIN).

Based in New York City, WIN is the first US-based funding accelerator focused solely on assisting innovative technology startups from around the world (non-US based) to secure funding from US investors.

Every other month our management team screens dozens of companies, and chooses the top 4 to present at our bi-monthly events. We look for companies with game changing ideas, experienced management teams, products that have been tested in local and global markets, and a desire to expand to the US market. Once a company is selected, it will go through 3-4 weeks of high-level coaching with our management team to fine-tune the overall message and investor presentation and highlight the information most relevant to our investors. The main goal of this process is to position presenting companies in a way that will offer them the best chance to secure funding and accelerate in the US market.

WIN’s investor community comprised of accredited angel investors, venture capitalists, and corporate/institutional investors investing in non-US technology startups with a desire to enter the US market and expand internationally.
